quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
author: Jenn Proske

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
author: Ann Landers

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: Pele

quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
author: Johnny Weir

quote: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
author: Bil Keane

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
author: John Updike

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
author: Brad Henry

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
author: Menachem Begin

quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
author: John Keats

quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
author: Nick Cannon

quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: True love stories never have endings.
author: Richard Bach

quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
author: Max Muller

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Frank Morgan

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Never make a decision when you are upset, sad, jealous or in love.
author: Mario Teguh

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
author: Theodore Hesburgh

quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Where there is great love, there are always wishes.
author: Willa Cather

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Liza, I love you more than any words can say. You have made me a complete person. You are everything to me. And I cannot think of living life without you. And I love you forever.
author: David Gest

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Love shall be our token; love be yours and love be mine.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
author: A. J. McLean

quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Unconditional love really exists in each of us. It is part of our deep inner being. It is not so much an active emotion as a state of being. It's not 'I love you' for this or that reason, not 'I love you if you love me.' It's love for no reason, love without an object.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Don't let fear or insecurity stop you from trying new things. Believe in yourself. Do what you love. And most importantly, be kind to others, even if you don't like them.
author: Stacy London

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
author: Kinky Friedman

quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
author: Zane Grey

quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
author: Julia Child

quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.
author: James E. Faust

quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
author: Charles Kuralt

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
author: Rumi

quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
author: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quote: I love the feeling of the fresh air on my face and the wind blowing through my hair.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: True love doesn't happen right away; it's an ever-growing process. It develops after you've gone through many ups and downs, when you've suffered together, cried together, laughed together.
author: Ricardo Montalban

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
author: William Blake

quote: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
author: Washington Irving

quote: I love fashion, and I love changing my style, my hair, my makeup, and everything I've done in the past has made me what I am now. Not everyone is going to like what I do, but I look back at everything, and it makes me smile.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet.
author: Katharine Lee Bates

quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You need a strong family because at the end, they will love you and support you unconditionally. Luckily, I have my dad, mom and sister.
author: Esha Gupta

quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The regret of my life is that I have not said 'I love you' often enough.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
author: Nicole Scherzinger

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Love who you are, embrace who you are. Love yourself. When you love yourself, people can kind of pick up on that: they can see confidence, they can see self-esteem, and naturally, people gravitate towards you.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.
author: George Chakiris

quote: Love is metaphysical gravity.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I see Americans of every party, every background, every faith who believe that we are stronger together: black, white, Latino, Asian, Native American; young, old; gay, straight; men, women, folks with disabilities, all pledging allegiance under the same proud flag to this big, bold country that we love. That's what I see. That's the America I know!
author: Barack Obama

quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We can bring positive energy into our daily lives by smiling more, talking to strangers in line, replacing handshakes with hugs, and calling our friends just to tell them we love them.
author: Brandon Jenner

quote: I believe in Liberty for all men: the space to stretch their arms and their souls, the right to breathe and the right to vote, the freedom to choose their friends, enjoy the sunshine, and ride on the railroads, uncursed by color; thinking, dreaming, working as they will in a kingdom of beauty and love.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: My number one goal is to love, support and be there for my son.
author: Farrah Fawcett

quote: Don't ever criticize yourself. Don't go around all day long thinking, 'I'm unattractive, I'm slow, I'm not as smart as my brother.' God wasn't having a bad day when he made you... If you don't love yourself in the right way, you can't love your neighbour. You can't be as good as you are supposed to be.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Family is a unique gift that needs to be appreciated and treasured, even when they're driving you crazy. As much as they make you mad, interrupt you, annoy you, curse at you, try to control you, these are the people who know you the best and who love you.
author: Jenna Morasca

quote: I love you more than my own skin.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: True love is selfless. It is prepared to sacrifice.
author: Sadhu Vaswani

quote: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home.
author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
author: Saint Basil

quote: A flower doesn't love you or hate you, it just exists.
author: Mike White

quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

quote: Love me or hate me, both are in my favour. If you love me, I will always be in your heart, and if you hate me, I will be in your mind.
author: Qandeel Baloch

quote: True love is not a strong, fiery, impetuous passion. It is, on the contrary, an element calm and deep. It looks beyond mere externals, and is attracted by qualities alone. It is wise and discriminating, and its devotion is real and abiding.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: What I am is how I came out. No one's perfect and you just have to accept your flaws and learn to love yourself.
author: Kelly Brook

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
author: Ferdinand Foch

quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
author: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: In finding love, I think it's important to be patient. In being in a relationship, I think it's important to be honest, to communicate, to respect and trust, and to strive to give more than you take.
author: Kina Grannis

quote: Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time.
author: Drake

quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: I need to see my own beauty and to continue to be reminded that I am enough, that I am worthy of love without effort, that I am beautiful, that the texture of my hair and that the shape of my curves, the size of my lips, the color of my skin, and the feelings that I have are all worthy and okay.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: Be happy with being you. Love your flaws. Own your quirks. And know that you are just as perfect as anyone else, exactly as you are.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: I must learn to love the fool in me - the one who feels too much, talks too much, takes too many chances, wins sometimes and loses often, lacks self-control, loves and hates, hurts and gets hurt, promises and breaks promises, laughs and cries.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad.
author: Robert Wagner

quote: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: Be a warrior when it comes to delivering on your ambitions. And a saint when it comes to treating people with respect, modeling generosity, and showing up with outright love.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: I'll love you, dear, I'll love you till China and Africa meet and the river jumps over the mountain and the salmon sing in the street.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: My friends and family are my support system. They tell me what I need to hear, not what I want to hear and they are there for me in the good and bad times. Without them I have no idea where I would be and I know that their love for me is what's keeping my head above the water.
author: Kelly Clarkson

quote: Love is an ice cream sundae, with all the marvelous coverings. Sex is the cherry on top.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Be strong, believe in freedom and in God, love yourself, understand your sexuality, have a sense of humor, masturbate, don't judge people by their religion, color or sexual habits, love life and your family.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I really love to ride my motorcycle. When I want to just get away and be by myself and clear my head, that's what I do.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
author: David Frost

quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Be beautiful, be stylish, and love yourself.
author: Karishma Tanna

quote: We should remember that saying 'I love you' is only a beginning. We need to say it, we need to mean it, and most importantly we need consistently to show it. We need to both express and demonstrate love.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Find joy in everything you choose to do. Every job, relationship, home... it's your responsibility to love it, or change it.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
author: Barbara Hershey

quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: The human soul is hungry for beauty; we seek it everywhere - in landscape, music, art, clothes, furniture, gardening, companionship, love, religion, and in ourselves. No one would desire not to be beautiful. When we experience the beautiful, there is a sense of homecoming.
author: John O'Donohue

quote: That's who my mom is. She's a listener and a doer. She's a woman driven by compassion, by faith, by a fierce sense of justice and a heart full of love. So, this November, I'm voting for a woman who is my role model, as a mother, and as an advocate. A woman who has spent her entire life fighting for families and children.
author: Chelsea Clinton

quote: Singing is my passion, my first love and the secret of my energy. Music to me is like finding my inner self, my soul. It gives me a great joy to see audiences enjoying with me. I have given my heart to singing. When I sing, I can feel romance in everything around me.
author: Kailash Kher

quote: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love.
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us.
author: Stendhal

quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
author: Pietro Aretino

quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: Until you have a son of your own... you will never know the joy, the love beyond feeling that resonates in the heart of a father as he looks upon his son.
author: Kent Nerburn

quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: We, the People, recognize that we have responsibilities as well as rights; that our destinies are bound together; that a freedom which only asks what's in it for me, a freedom without a commitment to others, a freedom without love or charity or duty or patriotism, is unworthy of our founding ideals, and those who died in their defense.
author: Barack Obama

quote: You give loyalty, you'll get it back. You give love, you'll get it back.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
author: Abhishek Bachchan

quote: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
author: Confucius

quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.
author: George Sand

quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
author: Andy Serkis

quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Marriage is not a noun; it's a verb. It isn't something you get. It's something you do. It's the way you love your partner every day.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: It's hard asking someone with a broken heart to fall in love again.
author: Eric Kripke

quote: What I love most about this crazy life is the adventure of it.
author: Juliette Binoche

quote: I have my own high standards for what I want in a partner and how I want to be treated. I bring a lot to the table. I'm not talking about material things but what I have to offer as a person - love and loyalty and all the things that make a good relationship.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: I try to say I love you in a million different ways. That's what I aspire to do. That's what I do best.
author: Christine McVie

quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: One way to feel good about yourself is to love yourself... to take care of yourself.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: You're not looking for perfection in your partner. Perfection is all about the ego. With soulmate love, you know that true love is what happens when disappointment sets in - and you're willing to deal maturely with these disappointments.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.
author: Lawrence Welk

quote: Enjoy the journey and try to get better every day. And don't lose the passion and the love for what you do.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace.
author: Carly Fiorina

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: I love my wife and I know she loves me. We're best friends. We're just lucky to have found each other. It takes a lot of work but I just feel very blessed that I found the right person. It's a very fortunate situation and not everyone has that.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: A deep sense of love and belonging is an irreducible need of all people. We are biologically, cognitively, physically, and spiritually wired to love, to be loved, and to belong. When those needs are not met, we don't function as we were meant to. We break. We fall apart. We numb. We ache. We hurt others. We get sick.
author: Brene Brown

quote: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Slavery is founded in the selfishness of man's nature - opposition to it is his love of justice. These principles are an eternal antagonism; and when brought into collision so fiercely, as slavery extension brings them, shocks and throes and convulsions must ceaselessly follow.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I say what I want to say and do what I want to do. There's no in between. People will either love you for it or hate you for it.
author: Eminem

quote: I love spending time with my friends and family. The simplest things in life give me the most pleasure: cooking a good meal, enjoying my friends.
author: Cindy Morgan

quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: Becoming a father increases your capacity for love and your level of patience. It opens up another door in a person - a door which you may not even have known was there. That's what I feel with my son. There's suddenly another level of love that expands. My son is my greatest joy, out of everything in my life.
author: Kyle MacLachlan

quote: I think fashion is a lot of fun. I love clothes. More than fashion or brand labels, I love design. I love the thought that people put into clothes. I love when clothes make cultural statements and I think personal style is really cool. I also freely recognize that fashion should be a hobby.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: My sister is a mess. I love her to death, but she is a mess.
author: RJ Mitte

quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: I knew I was going to love my daughter, but I had no idea how much I would love her.
author: Jeremy Sisto

quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that's the difference.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: I spent a lot of years trying to outrun or outsmart vulnerability by making things certain and definite, black and white, good and bad. My inability to lean into the discomfort of vulnerability limited the fullness of those important experiences that are wrought with uncertainty: Love, belonging, trust, joy, and creativity to name a few.
author: Brene Brown

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: When you love and accept yourself, when you know who really cares about you, and when you learn from your mistakes, then you stop caring about what people who don't know you think.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Every animal has his or her story, his or her thoughts, daydreams, and interests. All feel joy and love, pain and fear, as we now know beyond any shadow of a doubt. All deserve that the human animal afford them the respect of being cared for with great consideration for those interests or left in peace.
author: Ingrid Newkirk

quote: I love the ocean. I've always liked the blue, so tranquil and peaceful and gliding. And the fear of it.
author: Siouxsie Sioux

quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The Eskimos had fifty-two names for snow because it was important to them: there ought to be as many for love.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: I love to sit on a mountain top and gaze. I don't think of anything but the people I care about and the view.
author: Julian Lennon

quote: Religion is meant to teach us true spiritual human character. It is meant for self-transformation. It is meant to transform anxiety into peace, arrogance into humility, envy into compassion, to awaken the pure soul in man and his love for the Source, which is God.
author: Radhanath Swami

quote: Using social media to hurt and destroy is callous, acted out by cowards hiding behind computers. My advice is to ignore negativity. Focus on the love around.
author: Martin Garrix

quote: Even in the deepest love relationship - when lovers say 'I love you' to each other - we don't really know what we're saying, because language isn't equal to the complexity of human emotions.
author: Duane Michals

quote: Let's practice motivation and love, not discrimination and hate.
author: Zendaya

quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
author: David Chang

quote: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first; nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
author: Theodore Zeldin

quote: God wants us to know that life is a series of beginnings, not endings. Just as graduations are not terminations, but commencements. Creation is an ongoing process, and when we create a perfect world where love and compassion are shared by all, suffering will cease.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
author: Al Lopez

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: The love of a dog is a pure thing. He gives you a trust which is total. You must not betray it.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: The best proof of love is trust.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Don't forget to love yourself.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I think in a lot of ways unconditional love is a myth. My mom's the only reason I know it's a real thing.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: People confuse ego, lust, insecurity with true love.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: I can't really explain what it's like to be in love, but I feel like it's being comfortable. It's almost like having a best friend. It's a beautiful thing.
author: Ashton Irwin

quote: Love implies anger. The man who is angered by nothing cares about nothing.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: The garden of love is green without limit and yields many fruits other than sorrow or joy. Love is beyond either condition: without spring, without autumn, it is always fresh.
author: Rumi

quote: Love and a red rose can't be hid.
author: Thomas Holcroft

quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: To know yourself as the Being underneath the thinker, the stillness underneath the mental noise, the love and joy underneath the pain, is freedom, salvation, enlightenment.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I thank God that I'm a product of my parents. That they infected me with their intelligence and energy for life, with their thirst for knowledge and their love. I'm grateful that I know where I come from.
author: Shakira

quote: I love the sounds and the power of pounding water, whether it is the waves or a waterfall.
author: Mike May

quote: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.
author: Billy Graham

quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Life is difficult for everyone; everyone has bad days. Everyone has trouble in their life, because it doesn't matter how rich you are: Sickness and trouble and worry and love, these things will mess with you at every level of life.
author: Domhnall Gleeson

quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: You've got to love yourself first. You've got to be okay on your own before you can be okay with somebody else.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: I was adored once too.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: My eye is ever on those who love me.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Win, lose or draw, you're all my cousins and I love you.
author: Chill Wills

quote: My imagination completely controls me, and forever feeds the fire that burns with dark red light in my heart by bringing me the best dreams. I've always had a wild imagination, a big heart and a tortured soul so I feel that dark fantasy, love and horror are in my blood.
author: Kim Elizabeth

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: But the love of adventure was in father's blood.
author: Buffalo Bill

quote: I just love working hard. I love being part of a team; I love working toward a common goal.
author: Tom Brady

quote: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.
author: James E. Faust

quote: Being a father has been, without a doubt, my greatest source of achievement, pride and inspiration. Fatherhood has taught me about unconditional love, reinforced the importance of giving back and taught me how to be a better person.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: I love my wife, she deserves anything and everything.
author: Aaron Spelling

quote: I don't think of myself as a role model. I do try to live in a compassionate, considerate and positive way. The only advice I can offer is to find what you love to do, find the joy in it, and express yourself through your passion.
author: Barry Williams

quote: Surely the day will come when color means nothing more than the skin tone, when religion is seen uniquely as a way to speak one's soul, when birth places have the weight of a throw of the dice and all men are born free, when understanding breeds love and brotherhood.
author: Josephine Baker

quote: I just think Valentine's Day is a day to really appreciate the person you love, no matter who it is, and to spend time with them. I don't think it's all about fancy presents or whatever. I think it's about spending that quality time with that special person.
author: Prince Royce

quote: I love looking in the mirror and feeling good about what I see.
author: Heather Morris

quote: Prejudice is sinful. All blood flows red. And the most harmful and foolish kind of prejudice is prejudice against yourself. Every woman is your sister, and every woman needs her sisters. So try to give other women the courtesy of your compassion, respect, and forgiveness. Love yourself despite - and because of - your flaws.
author: Jewell Parker Rhodes

quote: There would be no need for love if perfection were possible. Love arises from our imperfection, from our being different and always in need of the forgiveness, encouragement and that missing half of ourselves that we are searching for, as the Greek myth tells us, in order to complete ourselves.
author: Eugene Kennedy

quote: I really just want to be warm yellow light that pours over everyone I love.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: With brothers you become friends. Some you hang out with more than others. You talk to one about the other a little more. You get mad at them. Then, you love them. Then, you apologize. You have to apologize whether you want to or not. You have to. That's your brother.
author: Tito Jackson

quote: To all the other dreamers out there, don't ever stop or let the world's negativity disenchant you or your spirit. If you surround yourself with love and the right people, anything is possible.
author: Adam Green

quote: There's a big difference between falling in love with someone and falling in love with someone and getting married. Usually, after you get married, you fall in love with the person even more.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: I love you when you bow in your mosque, kneel in your temple, pray in your church. For you and I are sons of one religion, and it is the spirit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it's going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.
author: John Lennon

quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: My favorite thing about motherhood is the outpouring of love that is non-judgmental and beautiful. My daughter just makes me happy, and she motivates me to be a kid again.
author: Christina Milian

quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The love of husband and wife, which is creative of new human life, is a marvellously personal sharing in the creative love of God who brings into being the eternal soul that comes to every human being with the gift of human life.
author: Vincent Nichols

quote: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: When you are missing someone, time seems to move slower, and when I'm falling in love with someone, time seems to be moving faster.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, 'I love you.'
author: Billy Graham

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: Falling in love and having a relationship are two different things.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: I love women, but I feel like you can't trust some of them. Some of them are liars, you know? Like I was in the park and I met this girl, she was cute and she had a dog. And I went up to her, we started talking. She told me her dog's name. Then I said, 'Does he bite?' She said, 'No.' And I said, 'Oh yeah? Then how does he eat?' Liar.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: In life, you have to take the pace that love goes. You don't force it. You just don't force love, you don't force falling in love, you don't force being in love - you just become. I don't know how to say that in English, but you just feel it.
author: Juan Pablo Galavis

quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: I love my dad, and I'm proud to be his daughter.
author: Paris Jackson

quote: True love doesn't come to you it has to be inside you.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: There have to be reasons that you get up in the morning and you want to live. Why do you want to live? What's the point? What inspires you? What do you love about the future? If the future does not include being out there among the stars and being a multi-planet species, I find that incredibly depressing.
author: Elon Musk

quote: No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you.
author: Waka Flocka Flame

quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: If we're destroying our trees and destroying our environment and hurting animals and hurting one another and all that stuff, there's got to be a very powerful energy to fight that. I think we need more love in the world. We need more kindness, more compassion, more joy, more laughter. I definitely want to contribute to that.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I love making new friends and I respect people for a lot of different reasons.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Love yourself, whatever makes you different, and use it to make you stand out. Mine is my voice and the fact that I'm gay: well, the fact that I'm flamboyantly gay.
author: Ross Mathews

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: I love shopping; I'm a jeans and a T-shirt kind of girl, but I go classy when I dress up - with a little bit of sexy.
author: Adrianne Palicki

quote: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: I'm in love with red. I think it's such a passionate color. Every flag of every country pretty much has red it it. It's power, there's no fence sitting with red. Either you love it or you don't. I think its blood and strength and life. I do love red. I love all colors. Great shades of blue, you find them in nature. They're all magic.
author: Bryan Batt

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Besides, I have a sister who's straight. And I want her to know that I love her and support her.
author: Dan Butler

quote: My goal is to be able to provide for myself and not have to worry about the daily expenses. I do want to be able to benefit from my work and make a good living, but I love it so much that I would do it for free.
author: Jenn Proske

quote: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that's ever happened to me.
author: Caroline Kennedy

quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: A lot of good love can happen in ten years.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Love is a serious mental disease.
author: Plato

quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Even when I'm sick and depressed, I love life.
author: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: I'm an introvert... I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.
author: Kevin Alejandro

quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: I think every girl needs to love herself, regardless of anything. Like if you're having a bad day, if you don't like your hair, if you don't have the best family situation, whatever, you have to love yourself and you can't do anything until you love yourself first.
author: Julianne Hough

quote: I love being my husband's wife.
author: Julianna Margulies

quote: I hate losing and cricket being my first love, once I enter the ground it's a different zone altogether and that hunger for winning is always there.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: Love is an endless mystery, for it has nothing else to explain it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: You might not make it to the top, but if you are doing what you love, there is much more happiness there than being rich or famous.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: I love snowboarding. It's probably my favorite sport. I love sitting on top of the mountain and the snow falling and that silence, that snow silence. That's, like, a very peaceful, happy place for me.
author: Philippe Cousteau, Jr.

quote: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
author: Rumi

quote: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success... such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: I can't explain chemistry. I really can't. I haven't got a clue what it's all about. It just happens. It's like falling in love. You can't explain why you fall in love or explain why it's this particular person.
author: Elaine Stritch

quote: I am blessed to be surrounded by the people I love. I thank them for their patience and grace.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: Every one has her own love life. Every one has a dream to get a perfect life partner. But this is not so easy in real life. In fact, one doesn't love; it happens.
author: Katrina Kaif

quote: It is my goal to love everyone. I hate no one. Regardless of their race, religion, their proclivities, the desire of their heart and how they want to live their life and the decisions that they make. I can even respect people's decisions and lifestyle choices just as I hope they have the courtesy to respect my decisions and my choices.
author: Kirk Cameron

quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
author: Buddha

quote: Knowing yourself, and learning to love yourself as you are, is the beginning of beauty. I think the most important thing is to show off what's most beautiful about you and to hide what's less beautiful.
author: Sonia Rykiel

quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I love to be outdoors, so I like to hike, bike and go to the beach.
author: Jillian Rose Reed

quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Dare, dream, dance, smile, and sing loudly! And have faith that love is an unstoppable force!
author: Suzanne Brockmann

quote: If I love you, I show you I love you every day. Little things, big things.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Love is not to be purchased, and affection has no price.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Patriotism is love of country. But you can't love your country without loving your countrymen and countrywomen. We don't always have to agree, but we must empower each other, we must find the common ground, we must build bridges across our differences to pursue the common good.
author: Cory Booker

quote: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Love often wears a mask in order to test loyalty.
author: Minna Antrim

quote: I call horses 'divine mirrors' - they reflect back the emotions you put in. If you put in love and respect and kindness and curiosity, the horse will return that.
author: Allan Hamilton

quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: We may not know what each day has in store for us. We could be gone tomorrow. Any minute could truly be our goodbye. But we do have this moment. This time. Today. Right now. It takes way more effort to shell out hate then it does to allow love to flow freely in our lives. After all, it's what we were born to do.
author: Grace Gealey

quote: In my life I've learned that true happiness comes from giving. Helping others along the way makes you evaluate who you are. I think that love is what we're all searching for. I haven't come across anyone who didn't become a better person through love.
author: Marla Gibbs

quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: February days are a marketing gimmick; love happens every day.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: I think careful cooking is love, don't you? The loveliest thing you can cook for someone who's close to you is about as nice a valentine as you can give.
author: Julia Child

quote: I love Australia; it was a really, really nice experience for me. It's such a beautiful place. The people are beautiful - like, really beautiful - and they are beautiful in terms of their personalities. It's a great place to be. It's like you are in a little bit of a dream world.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
author: Ovid

quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I believe in soulmates, yes, but I believe you also have to work at love. I happen to believe your soulmate doesn't have to be your partner - your soulmate could be your best friend, your sibling, it doesn't have to be the person you marry.
author: Cheryl Cole

quote: Like love, breakfast is best when made at home.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: You will reciprocally promise love, loyalty and matrimonial honesty. We only want for you this day that these words constitute the principle of your entire life and that with the help of divine grace you will observe these solemn vows that today, before God, you formulate.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: The ultimate dream in life is to be able to do what you love and learn something from it.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: The eyes those silent tongues of love.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I trust you: That's huge. That's truth. That's real love. Everyone uses 'I love you' so loosely.
author: Justin Chatwin

quote: Football is unconditional love.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Your competition is not other people but the time you kill, the ill will you create, the knowledge you neglect to learn, the connections you fail to build, the health you sacrifice along the path, your inability to generate ideas, the people around you who don't support and love your efforts, and whatever god you curse for your bad luck.
author: James Altucher

quote: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: I've really come to realize you have to love yourself before you can expect someone else to.
author: Leah Remini

quote: A lot of times, in our culture and our society, we put romantic love somehow on a higher plane than self-love and friendship love. You can't do that. You have to honor and really fully invest in all these different loving relationships.
author: Delilah

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Our first and last love is self-love.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Love in the real world means saying you're sorry 10 times a day.
author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quote: In the stillness of your presence, you can feel your own formless and timeless reality as the unmanifested life that animates your physical form. You can then feel the same life deep within every other human and every other creature. You look beyond the veil of form and separation. This is the realization of oneness. This is love.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Love will find its way through all languages on its own.
author: Rumi

quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Your duty is to treat everybody with love as a manifestation of the Lord.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: I love the smell of rain, and I love the sound of the ocean waves.
author: Amy Purdy

quote: Relationships are eternal. The 'separation' is another chapter in the relationship. Often, letting go of the old form of the relationship becomes a lesson in pure love much deeper than any would have learned had the couple stayed together.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I am a bit of a hopeless romantic. I really do have a faith and a belief in love, and when I love, I love hard.
author: Melanie Fiona

quote: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Who is wise in love, love most, say least.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I think it's not really difficult to write about love. We've been saying the same thing over and over for so many years. But it depends on how honest it is and how good you make it feel. You can say 'I love you' in a trillion ways, and it can always sound different or feel different.
author: Babyface

quote: I'm very happy being me, although sometimes I'd love to be a bird so that I could fly.
author: Joy Fielding

quote: Accept yourself, love yourself.
author: Chanel Iman

quote: The struggle of my life created empathy - I could relate to pain, being abandoned, having people not love me.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I have eclectic taste, and I love vintage style mixed with glamour and old world charm.
author: Sonam Kapoor

quote: Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
author: Marian Keyes

quote: A person once asked me, in a provocative manner, if I approved of homosexuality. I replied with another question: 'Tell me: when God looks at a gay person, does he endorse the existence of this person with love, or reject and condemn this person?' We must always consider the person.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished.
author: Og Mandino

quote: We are supposed to enjoy the good stuff now, while we can, with the people we love. Life has a funny way of teaching us that lesson over and over again.
author: Sheena Easton

quote: The moment I first heard love I gave up my soul, my heart, and my eyes.
author: Rumi

quote: The thing is that love gives us a ringside seat on somebody else's flaws, so of course you're gonna spot some things that kinda need to be mentioned. But often the romantic view is to say, 'If you loved me, you wouldn't criticise me.' Actually, true love is often about trying to teach someone how to be the best version of themselves.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: If love is the treasure, laughter is the key.
author: Yakov Smirnoff

quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'm very thankful to all my fans for their constant love and support. I am what I am because of their unconditional love.
author: Mahesh Babu

quote: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: When you look into the eyes of an animal you've rescued, you can't help but fall in love.
author: Paul Shaffer

quote: Some white people hate black people, and some white people love black people, some black people hate white people, and some black people love white people. So you see it's not an issue of black and white, it's an issue of Lovers and Haters.
author: Eden Ahbez

quote: It's true, you never forget your first love, and, for me, that will always be Paris.
author: Caitriona Balfe

quote: I want to tell women that you need to love yourself and make yourself a priority. It's only when you are happy yourself, can you make everyone else around you happy. I am still a dreamer and still believe in fairy tales, but there is only that much one should give another person. You need to keep something for yourself.
author: Bipasha Basu

quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: The best thing about being a DJ is making people happy. There is nothing like seeing people get up from a table to dance or the expression on their face when they hear a song they love. I also love to educate people on music they have never heard.
author: Chelsea Leyland

quote: I'm kind of a good girl - and I'm not. I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect. I'm a bad girl because I like to tease. I know that I have sex appeal in my deck of cards. But I like to get people thinking. That's what the stories in my music do.
author: Katy Perry

quote: The body of a beautiful woman is not made for love; it is too exquisite.
author: Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec

quote: My mom always said that there would be haters. Not everyone can love ya.
author: Joel Madden

quote: I don't have time for hobbies. At the end of the day, I treat my job as a hobby. It's something I love doing.
author: David Beckham

quote: It sounds like a cliche but I also learnt that you're not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are.
author: Emma Watson

quote: To love our neighbor as ourselves is such a truth for regulating human society, that by that alone one might determine all the cases in social morality.
author: John Locke

quote: I've accepted that we've all got crap to deal with and problems that we're fighting not to be defined by. At the end of the day, we all want the same stuff: fulfillment, love, support, comfort, and a hot-air balloon with laser guns attached to it. The most important thing is that we appreciate the crazy ride we're on.
author: Zach Anner

quote: True love, to me, is when she's the first thought that goes through your head when you wake up and the last thought that goes through your head before you go to sleep.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
author: Charles Morgan

quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: Loved. You can't use it in the past tense. Death does not stop that love at all.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: The two most misused words in the entire English vocabulary are love and friendship. A true friend would die for you, so when you start trying to count them on one hand, you don't need any fingers.
author: Larry Flynt

quote: Gay marriage - it's not about two people being gay: it's about two people who love each other and who have decided to commit to each other for the exact same reasons any other couple would get married.
author: Luke Macfarlane

quote: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry, uplifting music, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future, give life to untold beauty, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.
author: Adam Braun

quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors as ourselves. Surely part of loving in this way is trying to understand what another person wants us to understand. I may not understand perfectly and I may not agree, but if I love you I should try to know what it is you wish I could know.
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love colour the most.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Whatever possession we gain by our sword cannot be sure or lasting, but the love gained by kindness and moderation is certain and durable.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
author: Jack Layton

quote: I spent my whole single life trying to be thin just to find someone who'd love me once I got fat.
author: Stephanie Klein

quote: I'm a basketball player. That's what I do and what I love but that's just not all who I am. I'm talented in a lot of different areas.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: My personal style falls between casual cool and meticulous slob. I'm most comfortable in jeans, but I love fashion.
author: Reid Scott

quote: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: No human creature can give orders to love.
author: George Sand

quote: Now, what really makes a teacher is love for the human child; for it is love that transforms the social duty of the educator into the higher consciousness of a mission.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Love is something far more than desire for sexual intercourse; it is the principal means of escape from the loneliness which afflicts most men and women throughout the greater part of their lives.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Allowing myself to love God completely has obviously shed light on my self-love because he loves me more than I could ever love myself.
author: Angie Stone

quote: I love when people underestimate me and then become pleasantly surprised.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: A kiss is a secret told to the mouth instead of the ear; kisses are the messengers of love and tenderness.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: What I love about Sade other than her smooth and sultry voice is her willingness to be vulnerable. As a powerful, strong and beautiful woman of color, she showed her delicate, passionate side in a world where most of us are putting on a brave face. I love how effortless her style was and how consistent that red lip was!
author: Wynter Gordon

quote: We don't need bigger cars or fancier clothes. We need self-respect, identity, community, love, variety, beauty, challenge and a purpose in living that is greater than material accumulation.
author: Donella Meadows

quote: Attachment is your biggest strength and your biggest weakness.
