Though it gives you the power to love someone more than yourself, it becomes difficult to live when you lose something you are attached to. Even when we have lost, we should go beyond that and get truly attached to someone. Loving someone truly is the most beautiful feeling.
author: Shahid Kapoor

quote: Love and friendship exclude each other.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: There are so many forms of love. Spending time with friends, love stories. I enjoy showing my love by baking a cake for somebody and writing his or her name on it, and seeing his or her reaction. I love to offer flowers, too!
author: Pom Klementieff

quote: Do what you love, and do it well - that's much more meaningful than any metric.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: Anything will give up its secrets if you love it enough. Not only have I found that when I talk to the little flower or to the little peanut they will give up their secrets, but I have found that when I silently commune with people, they give up their secrets also - if you love them enough.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: What I find most disturbing about Valentine's Day is, look, I get that you have to have a holiday of love, but in the height of flu season, it makes no sense.
author: Lewis Black

quote: Fall in love with a dog, and in many ways you enter a new orbit, a universe that features not just new colors but new rituals, new rules, a new way of experiencing attachment.
author: Caroline Knapp

quote: No better way is there to learn to love Nature than to understand Art. It dignifies every flower of the field. And, the boy who sees the thing of beauty which a bird on the wing becomes when transferred to wood or canvas will probably not throw the customary stone.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Drawing is the only thing I've found in which I can lose myself completely. I love it. It started as something that relaxed me, but now it's a struggle because I'm pushing myself. The day-to-day sketching is fraught.
author: Peter Capaldi

quote: As long as you know yourself and you got good people around you and you passionate about what you do, that's all that matters because at the end of the day, you go to sleep with the people you love, you wake up with the people you love, and you spend your time with the people you love.
author: Tyga

quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I just love pretty things, whether it is art, a song or a pair of shoes.
author: Rita Ora

quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Follow your heart. Do what you love. Because I was constantly struggling with that. If it's in your heart, go for it. Don't listen to other people.
author: Maz Jobrani

quote: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!
author: Ginger Rogers

quote: People love me. And you know what, I have been very successful. Everybody loves me.
author: Donald Trump

quote: True generosity is an offering; given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.
author: Suze Orman

quote: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging.
author: Brene Brown

quote: I love getting dressed up in a suit because I don't do it all the time.
author: Jason Statham

quote: Let us be about setting high standards for life, love, creativity, and wisdom. If our expectations in these areas are low, we are not likely to experience wellness. Setting high standards makes every day and every decade worth looking forward to.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Death and love are the two wings that bear the good man to heaven.
author: Michelangelo

quote: The mornings along the coast where the fog and mist meet with the salty spray of the seas is one of my favourite smells. I love the smell in the evergreen forest just after it rains - The Redwood Forest in California has the coast, too, so you have the best of everything!
author: Paul Walker

quote: Today I begin to understand what love must be, if it exists... When we are parted, we each feel the lack of the other half of ourselves. We are incomplete like a book in two volumes of which the first has been lost. That is what I imagine love to be: incompleteness in absence.
author: Edmond de Goncourt

quote: I love Lil Wayne; that's like my little brother. He's just the coolest dude on Earth.
author: Fat Joe

quote: With love, there are so many layers to it that you can write all day about it. It's not just heartbreak or falling in love; there's so many different ways to look at it.
author: Shawn Mendes

quote: I love everything about the holidays: the decorations, the parties, and spending time with friends and family. What I love most is that feeling of giving back. Every bit counts.
author: Brad Goreski

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
author: Anne Frank

quote: Surround yourself with good people who encourage and love you. There are always ups and downs, no matter how successful you are.
author: Liana Liberato

quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
author: Lord Byron

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I know what it is like to be brought up with unconditional love. In my life that came from my grandmother.
author: Andre Leon Talley

quote: Alcohol is like love. The first kiss is magic, the second is intimate, the third is routine. After that you take the girl's clothes off.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Don't walk behind me, I may not lead. There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Suicide is a serious thing. And if you know anyone who is suicidal, you need to get them help. No one should be in pain. Everyone should love themselves.
author: Gerard Way

quote: I love being on the road. I love that lifestyle, traveling city to city, rocking out and moving on to the next place.
author: Caleb Johnson

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
author: George Eliot

quote: Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it.
author: Donald Knuth

quote: Going home, spending time with the family, I feel they're my friends as well, all of them. I look forward to meeting any one of them for a coffee, and when we all get together, I just love it.
author: Domhnall Gleeson

quote: I love fairy tales because of their haunting beauty and magical strangeness. They are set in worlds where anything can happen. Frogs can be kings, a thicket of brambles can hide a castle where a royal court has lain asleep for a hundred years, a boy can outwit a giant, and a girl can break a curse with nothing but her courage and steadfastness.
author: Kate Forsyth

quote: I love the sensation of being out in the open air, far away from all the distractions of modern life. I will usually disappear for a couple of hours, and that time on my bike is quite sacred, as it's when I do all my serious thinking. Sometimes I will stop off at bikers' cafe and have a bacon sandwich.
author: Paul Hollywood

quote: There is no right time and right place for love... it can happen any time.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: A wedding, a great wedding, is just a blast. A celebration of romance and community and love... What is unfun about that? Nothing.
author: Ariel Levy

quote: Love is a strange emotion. It is ever evolving. Lust is transient. With time, one realizes that love and togetherness are two different things. Very few people are lucky enough to experience the two emotions simultaneously.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: The rose is the flower and handmaiden of love - the lily, her fair associate, is the emblem of beauty and purity.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: When you are older you will understand how precious little things, seemingly of no value in themselves, can be loved and prized above all price when they convey the love and thoughtfulness of a good heart.
author: Edwin Booth

quote: Mental toughness is spartanism with qualities of sacrifice, self-denial, dedication. It is fearlessness, and it is love.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I believe in true love, and I believe in happy endings. And I believe.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: It's not easy to sit down and open yourself up and say, 'This is how much I love you,' you know? It's scary to do that.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: Serious and intense people, they drain you. But someone who's an idiot, like myself, they're fun. You either hate me or you love me.
author: Pauly Shore

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Life has been kind to me. I am happy with the love and appreciation that I have been getting throughout my career. I feel blessed.
author: Vidya Balan

quote: Patriotism is not an abstract concept. It begins from one's own home. It buds out from the love for one's parents, spouses and children, the love for one's own home, village and workplace, and further develops into the love for one's country and fellow people.
author: Kim Jong-un

quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: We write for the same reason that we walk, talk, climb mountains or swim the oceans - because we can. We have some impulse within us that makes us want to explain ourselves to other human beings. That's why we paint, that's why we dare to love someone - because we have the impulse to explain who we are.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Do what you love. Know your own bone; gnaw at it, bury it, unearth it, and gnaw it still.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I love those connections that make this big old world feel like a little village.
author: Gina Bellman

quote: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, With love in the loving cup, Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: You don't walk away if you love someone. You help the person.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Little white lies are part of everyday life. If you're in court being charged with a felony, you're probably going to be tempted to lie. Or if your girlfriend asks you if the sweater she is wearing makes her look fat; you're going to lie because you love that person. There are different reasons and justifications to lie; it's human nature.
author: Monica Raymund

quote: I have learned that raising children is the single most difficult thing in the world to do. It takes hard work, love, luck, and a lot of energy, and it is the most rewarding experience that you can ever have.
author: Janet Reno

quote: I love, but I am not entirely sure how to be loved: how to be seen and known for the utterly flawed woman I am. It demands surrender. It demands acknowledging that I am not perfect, but perhaps I deserve affection anyway.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: Being in love with somebody is a wonderful feeling.
author: Shane Warne

quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
author: John Galsworthy

quote: So to all Americans, in every city near and far, small and large, from mountain to mountain, and from ocean to ocean, hear these words: You will never be ignored again. Your voice, your hopes, and your dreams will define our American destiny. And your courage and goodness and love will forever guide us along the way.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: They do not love that do not show their love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I have more of a desire to write songs about being an independent woman than being in love, songs about getting up and moving on even if I have a broken heart. 'Wanna Say' is one of the few love songs I've ever done.
author: Kat Graham

quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
author: Euripides

quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
author: Princess Diana

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Whatever you want to do, if you want to be great at it, you have to love it and be able to make sacrifices for it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I love Paris for the million reasons that everybody loves the city. It's an incredibly romantic and beautiful place.
author: Alan Furst

quote: The secret to a happy marriage is if you can be at peace with someone within four walls, if you are content because the one you love is near to you, either upstairs or downstairs, or in the same room, and you feel that warmth that you don't find very often, then that is what love is all about.
author: Bruce Forsyth

quote: Computers are magnificent tools for the realization of our dreams, but no machine can replace the human spark of spirit, compassion, love, and understanding.
author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I am what I am. I love me! And I don't mean that egotistically - I love that God has allowed me to take whatever it was that I had and to make something out of it.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.
author: Kristin Chenoweth

quote: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.
author: Gilbert Parker

quote: Everyone feels like family and I am back in the city that I love.
author: Chris Noth

quote: You can be fat and love yourself. You can be fat and have a great damn personality. You can be fat and sew your own clothes. But you can't be fat and healthy.
author: Susan Powter

quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It's so different when you change your hair color, you're treated so differently. It's a very funny experience. It's fun - I love changing up my hair.
author: Kate Bosworth

quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Human rights, race relations, gender politics, health care, and foreign policy - it's a lot to keep track of, and yet all of these things affect us in our daily lives. Making sense of everything requires meticulous unpacking of feelings, delicate navigation of social norms, and a community of love to help along the way.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: Had we not loved ourselves at all, we could never have been obliged to love anything. So that self-love is the basis of all love.
author: Thomas Traherne

quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: I know what motivated you was not just a political campaign. It was your love of our country.
author: Alan Nunnelee

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Love is the silent saying and saying of a single name.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I love life. There's so much to learn and see all the time, and nothing nicer for me than to wake up, and the sky is blue.
author: Pattie Boyd

quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Maybe true love isn't out there for me, but I can sublimate my loneliness with the notion that true love is out there for someone.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: He that is jealous is not in love.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: At sunrise everything is luminous but not clear. It is those we live with and love and should know who elude us. You can love completely without complete understanding.
author: Norman Maclean

quote: Do all things with love.
author: Og Mandino

quote: It's easy to look at the things of this world to solve our challenges and obstacles in life, but when we submit our lives to Christ, His grace, mercy, peace and love will bring true fulfillment to our lives.
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: When you love fashion, there is no weekend. Everything just blends together.
author: Carine Roitfeld

quote: All the commandments: You shall not commit adultery, you shall not kill, you shall not steal, you shall not covet, and so on, are summed up in this single command: You must love your neighbor as yourself.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: I love my cats more than I love most people. Probably more than is healthy.
author: Amy Lee

quote: If you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners love those who love them. And if you do good to those who do good to you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners do the same.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Your body is your body; it's natural. Learn to love yourself for it.
author: Emily Ratajkowski

quote: Love God; love others; do your best in all you do, even if you fall short!
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: You don't have to have a ring on your finger to say, 'I love you.'
author: Tyra Banks

quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think.
author: Robert Henri

quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Touch seems to be as essential as sunlight.
author: Diane Ackerman

quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Red is the great clarifier - bright and revealing. I can't imagine becoming bored with red - it would be like becoming bored with the person you love.
author: Diana Vreeland

quote: Love and doubt have never been on speaking terms.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: All you need in the world is love and laughter. That's all anybody needs. To have love in one hand and laughter in the other.
author: August Wilson

quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I'm just not into trying to convince people like me. I always say to myself, 'It is what it is.' I walk into a situation knowing that people are either going to love me or they're not, and that's OK. I'm just going to be me. You can't be everything to everyone.
author: NeNe Leakes

quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Love one another, but make not a bond of love: Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I have felt cats rubbing their faces against mine and touching my cheek with claws carefully sheathed. These things, to me, are expressions of love.
author: James Herriot

quote: You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. You don't have to do anything to earn it. Your shortcomings, your lack of self-esteem, physical perfection, or social and economic success - none of that matters. No one can take this love away from you, and it will always be here.
author: Ram Dass

quote: I love the beach, and I love sunshine.
author: Megan Fox

quote: Thank God I'm in touch with my emotions enough to be able to pick up my children, kiss them all over and say 'I love you' over and over.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: It's really important to talk to yourself and look at yourself in the mirror and love who you are.
author: Lilly Singh

quote: I love the idea of the street vibe, having folks together, out in the street at midnight.
author: Sean Paul

quote: Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: You can't let someone else lower your self-esteem, because that's what it is - self-esteem. You need to first love yourself before you have anybody else love you.
author: Winnie Harlow

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Love is the only gold.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people.
author: Huey Newton

quote: Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves, even when we risk disappointing others.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
author: Ray Stannard Baker

quote: It's funny what memory does, isn't it? My favorite holiday tradition might not have happened more than once or twice. But because it is such a good memory, so encapsulating of everything I love about the holidays, in my mind it happened every year. Without fail.
author: Molly O'Keefe

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: Prayer is an act of love; words are not needed. Even if sickness distracts from thoughts, all that is needed is the will to love.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Well, a lot of people don't know this about me, but I'm actually shy around people I don't know. I would just say with my first concert, my first tour, I didn't really talk onstage. I was like, 'Thank you, I love you guys,' or whatever. But now I've just kind of learned to work a crowd.
author: Avril Lavigne

quote: I obviously would love to have a girlfriend, but a girlfriend deserves so much of your time and energy. And she deserves to be treated like a princess because that's how you should treat your girls. And if I can't give them that time and that devotion because of my dedication to football, then I don't feel like I should almost waste their time.
author: J. J. Watt

quote: The true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality.
author: Che Guevara

quote: Gaming has been a great way to get to know people. That's part of what I love about games, that they are social.
author: Rich Sommer

quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: I think tolerance and acceptance and love is something that feeds every community.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I don't think I've had love at first sight. But, I've definitely had moments where I've seen a person, and I'm like, 'Wow, there is something different about you, and I really want to get to know you.'
author: Josh Hutcherson

quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own... Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: I am happier when I love than when I am loved. I adore my husband, my son, my grandchildren, my mother, my dog, and frankly, I don't know if they even like me. But who cares? Loving them is my joy.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Dreams are the guiding words of the soul. Why should I henceforth not love my dreams and not make their riddling images into objects of my daily consideration?
author: Carl Jung

quote: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Young love is a flame; very pretty, often very hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. The love of the older and disciplined heart is as coals, deep-burning, unquenchable.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I love cats because I enjoy my home; and little by little, they become its visible soul.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in.
author: Kristin Armstrong

quote: Life is too short to do the things you don't love doing.
author: Bruce Dickinson

quote: Times of transition are strenuous, but I love them. They are an opportunity to purge, rethink priorities, and be intentional about new habits. We can make our new normal any way we want.
author: Kristin Armstrong

quote: Part of growing up is realizing you learn to love so many people. It's about forming those relationships and finding what will last forever.
author: Dylan O'Brien

quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: My son has been the best thing that has happened in my life. He has been amazing, and he is truly heaven-sent. And so, I just feel all that love.
author: Ciara

quote: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Waking up every day and loving someone who may or may not love us back, whose safety we can't ensure, who may stay in our lives or may leave without a moment's notice, who may be loyal to the day they die or betray us tomorrow - that's vulnerability.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.
author: Woody Allen

quote: May my soul bloom in love for all existence.
author: Rudolf Steiner

quote: People love chopping wood. In this activity one immediately sees results.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good plays, good company, good conversation - what are they? They are the happiest people in the world.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: I love what I do, and I just remember that every breath and every moment is a gift and it can be taken away at any time, so I want to appreciate it and be grateful for it while it's here.
author: Alyson Stoner

quote: I love outdoor winter activities like snow tubing and snowball throwing.
author: Kat Graham

quote: To love is to admire with the heart; to admire is to love with the mind.
author: Theophile Gautier

quote: And I love that even in the toughest moments, when we're all sweating it - when we're worried that the bill won't pass, and it seems like all is lost - Barack never lets himself get distracted by the chatter and the noise. Just like his grandmother, he just keeps getting up and moving forward... with patience and wisdom, and courage and grace.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
author: Erich Segal

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Suffering passes, while love is eternal. That's a gift that you have received from God. Don't waste it.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
author: James Herriot

quote: If you look at the movie 'Belly,' I identify with Sincere the most. I am a gangster. I love my lady to death. I'm not in the game for the wrong reasons. I'm not in the game for the glory. I'm in the game to survive so the people that I love could be straight. I'm a highly intelligent individual.
author: Kevin Gates

quote: I'm fascinated with myself and love hearing the sound of my own voice. I'd like to hear what I have to say. A lot of people don't like being alone because they truly don't like themselves, but I love me.
author: Gene Simmons

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Falling in love is the best way to kill your heart because then it's not yours anymore. It's laid in a coffin, waiting to be cremated.
author: Ville Valo

quote: True, we love life, not because we are used to living, but because we are used to loving. There is always some madness in love, but there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Petrarch

quote: I love you all too much, it's one of just of my problems.
author: Herve Villechaize

quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I never knew how to worship until I knew how to love.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Everything we do is for the purpose of altering consciousness. We form friendships so that we can feel certain emotions, like love, and avoid others, like loneliness. We eat specific foods to enjoy their fleeting presence on our tongues. We read for the pleasure of thinking another person's thoughts.
author: Sam Harris

quote: If you are happy, you can give happiness. If you don't love yourself and if you are unhappy with yourself, you can't give anything else but that.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I love new places, new people, new ideas. I love cultural differences, and I'm fascinated by the truth - all the different versions of it.
author: Martin Henderson

quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The love you have for your child is so much greater than any challenge you'll face as a parent, and that's what helps you through.
author: Hilary Duff

quote: Taste and love are not the servants of the will. Love is and must be free. It rises from the heart like perfume from a flower.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: We do not want riches, we want peace and love.
author: Red Cloud

quote: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do.
author: Christina Milian

quote: Safety from external danger is the most powerful director of national conduct. Even the ardent love of liberty will, after a time, give way to its dictates.
author: Alexander Hamilton

quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
author: David Wilkerson

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: Diamonds have an image of purity and light. They are given as a pledge of love and worn as a symbol of commitment.
author: Peter Singer

quote: The Universal Zulu Nation stands to acknowledge wisdom, understanding, freedom, justice, and equality, peace, unity, love, and having fun, work, overcoming the negative through the positive, science, mathematics, faith, facts, and the wonders of God, whether we call him Allah, Jehovah, Yahweh, or Jah.
author: Afrika Bambaataa

quote: Through devotion, your family cares become more peaceful, mutual love between husband and wife becomes more sincere, the service we owe to the prince more faithful, and our work, no matter what it is, becomes more pleasant and agreeable.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Everyone discusses my art and pretends to understand, as if it were necessary to understand, when it is simply necessary to love.
author: Claude Monet

quote: One morning, about four o'clock, I was driving my car just about as fast as I could. I thought, Why am I out this time of night? I was miserable, and it came to me: I'm falling in love with somebody I have no right to fall in love with.
author: June Carter Cash

quote: Anxiety is love's greatest killer. It makes others feel as you might when a drowning man holds on to you. You want to save him, but you know he will strangle you with his panic.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: I think falling in love is always a surprise, right?
author: Josh Dallas

quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.
author: Ovid

quote: When the people we love stop paying attention, trust begins to slip away and hurt starts seeping in.
author: Brene Brown

quote: I love to think of nature as an unlimited broadcasting station, through which God speaks to us every hour, if we will only tune in.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: The greatest movement for social justice our country has ever known is the civil rights movement and it was totally rooted in a love ethic.
author: bell hooks

quote: Love is the crowning grace of humanity, the holiest right of the soul, the golden link which binds us to duty and truth, the redeeming principle that chiefly reconciles the heart to life, and is prophetic of eternal good.
author: Petrarch

quote: Swimming is probably the ultimate of burnout sports. It's ironic because millions of people who swim as their regular exercise love the meditation aspect of it; you don't wind up with any orthopedic injuries. But when you swim at a world class level for hours and hours - the loneness of the long distance runner.
author: Diana Nyad

quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
author: Samuel Lover

quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: Love dies only when growth stops.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Because of the dog's joyfulness, our own is increased. It is no small gift. It is not the least reason why we should honor as love the dog of our own life, and the dog down the street, and all the dogs not yet born.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry; to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When I understand myself, I understand you, and out of that understanding comes love.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Whether you're successful or not, you'll never actually feel the joys of accomplishment unless you love yourself. Success can be very difficult to deal with. You have to stay in the center. If you let your success define you, then you're really just setting yourself up for failure.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
author: Emily Bronte

quote: Falling in love, romance, matters of the heart - when you fall in love, on some biochemical level you know there is a chance it won't work out. It's ingrained in us that if you take such an enormous risk on someone with your heart that it might not pay off. I gamble all my chips and I might actually lose everything.
author: Rachael Taylor

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Children love and want to be loved and they very much prefer the joy of accomplishment to the triumph of hateful failure. Do not mistake a child for his symptom.
author: Erik Erikson

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: There is always something left to love. And if you ain't learned that, you ain't learned nothing.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.
author: John Lennon

quote: We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Life is full of confusion. Confusion of love, passion, and romance. Confusion of family and friends. Confusion with life itself. What path we take, what turns we make. How we roll our dice.
author: Matthew Underwood

quote: The greatest gift God has given me is the capacity of love for people. I have so many faults, but caring about people is not one of them.
author: Barbara Mandrell

quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Music is the best way for me to say I love you.
author: Mireille Mathieu

quote: When it comes to beauty, I feel that hanging with people you love, laughing, and doing silly things gets your spirits up. We are always prettier when we are happier.
author: Sara Sampaio

quote: There are other things that I could do, but there's really nothing that I love as much as horse racing.
author: Chantal Sutherland

quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: I have very high standards for every part of life - my work, my relationships, food, love. I can't just pretend.
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
author: Anais Nin

quote: To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

quote: Love seeks one thing only: the good of the one loved. It leaves all the other secondary effects to take care of themselves. Love, therefore, is its own reward.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: The cure for all the ills and wrongs, the cares, the sorrows, and the crimes of humanity, all lie in the one word 'love'. It is the divine vitality that everywhere produces and restores life.
author: Lydia M. Child

quote: The only love affair I have ever had was with music.
author: Maurice Ravel

quote: Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.
author: Euripides

quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Jealousy contains more of self-love than of love.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Success comes from taking the initiative and following up... persisting... eloquently expressing the depth of your love. What simple action could you take today to produce a new momentum toward success in your life?
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
author: Javan

quote: Three passions, simple but overwhelmingly strong, have governed my life: the longing for love, the search for knowledge, and unbearable pity for the suffering of mankind.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Although we have, in theory, abolished human slavery, recognized women's rights, and stopped child labor, we continue to enslave other species who, if we simply pay attention, show quite clearly that they experience parental love, pain, and the desire for freedom, just as we do.
author: Ingrid Newkirk

quote: I love to wear red lipstick a lot, even in the daytime.
author: Heather Morris

quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: I could talk food all day. I love good food.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
author: Taraji P. Henson

quote: Though lovers be lost, love shall not.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Who, being loved, is poor?
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
author: Plato

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
author: John Donne

quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: This love is silent.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
author: Anatole France

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is suffering. One side always loves more.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love is energy of life.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Who so loves believes the impossible.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.
author: Erich Segal

quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
author: Brendan Behan

quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.
author: Robert Burton

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
author: Andre Breton

quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: My plan is just to love harder than I've ever loved before, hide nothing, and embrace that I'm an imperfect human being. Oh, and sadness - sadness is everything.
author: Sam Smith

quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The past explains how I got here, but the future is up to me - and I love to live life at full throttle.
author: Janice Dickinson

quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I was always a fan of the old-style comics. I loved vaudeville. I loved Milton Berle, Dick Shawn, Phyllis Diller, Don Rickles, Charlie Callas, all those guys. Hilarious. I love the Bing Crosby and Bob Hope movies, and Abbott & Costello. My television influences were 'Monty Python's Flying Circus,' 'Benny Hill,' and 'Hee Haw.'
author: Larry the Cable Guy

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The ear is the avenue to the heart.
author: Voltaire

quote: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: We all need each other.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love is blind.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Love conquers all.
author: Virgil

quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Be of love a little more careful than of anything.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: There is only one real deprivation... and that is not to be able to give one's gifts to those one loves most.
author: May Sarton

quote: Sympathy constitutes friendship; but in love there is a sort of antipathy, or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other, and both together make up one whole.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: We can't command our love, but we can our actions.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
author: Leslie Fiedler

quote: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
author: Martin Buber

quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
author: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: To love abundantly is to live abundantly, and to love forever is to live forever.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Love is stronger than justice.
author: Sting

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
author: George Harrison

quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
author: Boethius

quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
author: John Keats

quote: It's important for us to latch onto the people that we love.
author: Connie Stevens

quote: A thought transfixed me: for the first time in my life, I saw the truth as it is set into song by so many poets, proclaimed as the final wisdom by so many thinkers. The truth - that love is the ultimate and the highest goal to which man can aspire.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Happy are those who dare courageously to defend what they love.
author: Ovid

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Love prefers twilight to daylight.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Love without conversation is impossible.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: To love is to act.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: People protect what they love.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Passion is momentary; love is enduring.
author: John Wooden

quote: I'm not saying that love always takes you to heaven. Your life can become a nightmare. But that said, it is worth taking the risk.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
author: Euripides

quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
author: George Herbert

quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: Love seeketh not itself to please, nor for itself hath any care, but for another gives its ease, and builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.
author: William Blake

quote: Romantic love is an illusion. Most of us discover this truth at the end of a love affair or else when the sweet emotions of love lead us into marriage and then turn down their flames.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: There is no person that love cannot heal; there is no soul that love cannot save.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Love is love's reward.
author: John Dryden

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
author: Theodore Dreiser

quote: Love is a great beautifier.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
author: Bob Hope

quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: There is more pleasure in loving than in being beloved.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: In a full heart there is room for everything, and in an empty heart there is room for nothing.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: Love has no errors, for all errors are the want for love.
author: William Law

quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
author: John Gay

quote: All mankind love a lover.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: There's no bad consequence to loving fully, with all your heart. You always gain by giving love.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: But love's a malady without a cure.
author: John Dryden

quote: What the world really needs is more love and less paper work.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: Love has a tide!
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
author: Anais Nin

quote: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us.
author: Madame de Stael

quote: The inner reality of love can be recognized only by love.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
author: Francis Beaumont

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: I'd love to have a proper sailing boat and go around the world.
author: Jonathan Powell

quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
author: Voltaire

quote: The praise that comes from love does not make us vain, but more humble.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
author: Armistead Maupin

quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
author: Richard Bach

quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: One does not fall in love; one grows into love, and love grows in him.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: Love is being stupid together.
author: Paul Valery

quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
author: Stendhal

quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: I was about half in love with her by the time we sat down. That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty... you fall half in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: The truth is that love smashes into your life like an ice floe, and even if your heart is built like the Titanic you go down.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: The love we have in our youth is superficial compared to the love that an old man has for his old wife.
author: Will Durant

quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: There is a woman at the begining of all great things.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: The god of love lives in a state of need. It is a need. It is an urge. It is a homeostatic imbalance. Like hunger and thirst, it's almost impossible to stamp out.
author: Plato

quote: Love is the difficult realization that something other than oneself is real.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
author: Andre Breton

quote: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have truly lived are the moments when you have done things in the spirit of love.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
author: Thomas Shadwell

quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: What force is more potent than love?
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: Ultimately love is everything.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: When you're in love you never really know whether your elation comes from the qualities of the one you love, or if it attributes them to her; whether the light which surrounds her like a halo comes from you, from her, or from the meeting of your sparks.
author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quote: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
author: Shirley MacLaine

quote: Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved.
author: William Congreve

quote: It is impossible to repent of love. The sin of love does not exist.
author: Muriel Spark

quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
author: Robert Browning

quote: When you love a man, he becomes more than a body. His physical limbs expand, and his outline recedes, vanishes. He is rich and sweet and right. He is part of the world, the atmosphere, the blue sky and the blue water.
author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber

quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: The love of our private friends is the only preparatory exercise for the love of all men.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: In matters of the heart, nothing is true except the improbable.
author: Madame de Stael

quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: To be able to say how much love, is love but little.
author: Petrarch

quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: The love which moves the world, according to common Christian belief, is God's love and the love of God.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: Love is the word used to label the sexual excitement of the young, the habituation of the middle-aged, and the mutual dependence of the old.
author: John Ciardi

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Who loves, raves.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
author: George Eliot

quote: You don't want to love - your eternal and abnormal craving is to be loved. You aren't positive, you're negative. You absorb, absorb, as if you must fill yourself up with love, because you've got a shortage somewhere.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: The fact is that love is of two kinds, one which commands, and one which obeys. The two are quite distinct, and the passion to which the one gives rise is not the passion of the other.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: People happy in love have an air of intensity.
author: Stendhal

quote: There are never enough I Love You's.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: Before I met my husband, I'd never fallen in love. I'd stepped in it a few times.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
author: David Byrne

quote: The spring of love becomes hidden and soon filled up.
author: Max Muller

quote: Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: Love is never wrong.
author: Melissa Etheridge

quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: For above all things Love means sweetness, and truth, and measure; yea, loyalty to the loved one and to your word. And because of this I dare not meddle with so high a matter.
author: Marie de France

quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: All love is lost but upon God alone.
author: William Dunbar

quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
author: Maurice Chevalier

quote: You don't have to go looking for love when it's where you come from.
author: Werner Erhard

quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
author: Ovid

quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: My wife, my family, my friends - they've all taught me things about love and what that emotion really means. In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Any time not spent on love is wasted.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
author: John Dryden

quote: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.
author: Judith Viorst

quote: The fate of love is that it always seems too little or too much.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity - love. And the story of a love is not important - what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
author: Lynda Barry

quote: The deep joy we take in the company of people with whom we have just recently fallen in love is undisguisable.
author: John Cheever

quote: A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: We love but once, for once only are we perfectly equipped for loving.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: When love is at its best, one loves so much that he cannot forget.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
author: Bryan Procter

quote: One must not trifle with love.
author: Alfred de Musset

quote: Love comes unseen; we only see it go.
author: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
author: John Morton

quote: How absurd and delicious it is to be in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it.
author: Barbara Pym

quote: Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: Love is... never asking for more than you are prepared to give.
author: Kim Casali

quote: If you've got love you've got life, if you can love you can live.
author: Kim Casali
